book.synopsis: Jesse Bear has a wonderful time getting ready for Halloween. He loves carving pumpkins and trying on costumes. But when it comes time for trick-or-treating, Jesse gets scared. With his parents by his side, Jesse soon builds up the courage to put on his scary mask -- and even plays a trick of his own!
book.dimensions: Height: 10 Inches, Length: 8 Inches, Width: 0.2 Inches
